I LOVE this little jacket! The rhinestones are so adorable, I love the color and the pattern on it! It’s pretty light weight which is nice for layering outfits. Only con I noticed is the zipper seems a little flimsy, hopefully it won’t break. Also the designs on the jacket are very clearly low quality and are sort of pixely, they also get cut off at the top of the coat where the hood connects but honestly none of it is that obvious from farther away and I really don’t mind.

(im 5’5 and 130 lbs) at first i bought a medium, it was really big so i returned and bought small. the only thing smaller is the area around the shoulders. it also makes me look a lot fatter than i am. the top part of the product is great but the rest disappoints. however the material is really soft and lightweight.

I have many problems with this jacket so I'm just going to list a few -I ordered a medium and got a large -The stitching is all over the place -The zipper is incredibly cheaply made and YOU CAN TELL -I wear a lot of oversized clothes so I'll get an L or XL and it looks fine this on the other hand fits so oddly So moral of the story please do NOT order this jacket!!
